events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision and submitted initial details of the incident.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on provided description mentioning vehicle and collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to assist with claim processing and customer support.
Customer was informed that their auto accident claim was received and acknowledged; next steps were clearly communicated.
Requested customer's vehicle registration, police report, and photos of car damage to support the accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and pictures of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation team initiated review of submitted documents and began contacting witnesses regarding the collision.
Completed thorough investigation confirming the customer was not at fault and all accident details were verified.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and rental car expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated prompt communication and support.
Claim was formally approved following customer's acceptance of the settlement agreement.
Payment for repairs and related expenses was issued to the customer and their preferred service provider.
The auto accident claim case was closed with all procedures completed and payment successfully delivered.
The file and all related documents have been archived in the system for future reference if needed.
